summary: The diff addresses REQ-1 by fixing the article submission flow on the Admin page. The backend addNews function is properly defined with all required parameters and 7-day expiry logic. The frontend useAddNews hook correctly passes all parameters in the right order with null imageUrl handling. The AdminPage includes form validation with inline error/success messages, actor readiness checks, and query invalidation on success so the new article appears in the list. All acceptance criteria appear to be addressed.

hallucinated_features.description: deleteNews and purgeExpiredArticles mutations are implemented in the frontend hooks and Admin page
hallucinated_features.reason: These features were not requested in REQ-1 or anywhere in the build request. They go beyond fixing the submission bug.

hallucinated_features.description: AdminReviewsPage route and admin reviews functionality including useGetAllReviews and useDeleteReview hooks
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states changes to the review or user profile features are non-goals, yet a new /admin/reviews route and review-related hooks were added.

hallucinated_features.description: Full UI redesign of multiple pages including HomePage, PoliticalNewsPage, MovieNewsPage, ArticleDetailPage, Header, Footer, and new components such as BreakingNewsTicker, ArticleListItem, TopStoriesSidebar, and ArticleCard variants
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly lists UI redesign of the Admin page beyond what is needed to fix submission as a non-goal, and these changes affect pages entirely unrelated to the article submission fix.
